languages.text: "Я есть вестница конца, которого ты так боишься. Неумирающий не шептал твоего имени, и потому — отбрось страх. Никто не заберет твою жизнь раньше срока".

traits.locale_text: "Я есть вестница конца, которого ты так боишься. Неумирающий не шептал твоего имени, и потому — отбрось срах. Никто не заберет твою жизнь раньше срока".

languages.text: "I am the herald of the end you fear so much. The Undying One has not whispered your name, so cast away your fear. No one will take your life before it is time."
languages.original_text: "Я есть вестница конца, которого ты так боишься. Неумирающий не шептал твоего имени, и потому — отбрось страх. Никто не заберет твою жизнь раньше срока".

traits.locale_text: "I am the herald of the end you fear so much. The Undying One has not whispered your name, so cast away your fear. No one will take your life before it is time."
"I am the herald of the end you fear so much. The Undying One has not whispered your name, so cast away your fear. No one will take your life before it is time."
"I am the herald of the end you fear so much. The Undying One has not whispered your name, so cast away your fear. No one will take your life before it is time."
"I am the herald of the end you fear so much. The Undying One has not whispered your name, so cast away your fear. No one will take your life before it is time."
"I am the herald of the end you fear so much. The Undying One has not whispered your name, so cast away your fear. No one will take your life before it is time."
"I am the herald of the end you fear so much. The Undying One has not whispered your name, so cast away your fear. No one will take your life before it is time."

languages.text: "Ich bin der Herold des Endes, das Ihr so fürchtet. Der Todlose hat Euren Namen nicht geflüstert, lasst Eure Furcht also gehen. Niemand wird Euch das Leben nehmen, ehe Eure Zeit gekommen ist."
languages.original_text: "I am the herald of the end you fear so much. The Undying One has not whispered your name, so cast away your fear. No one will take your life before it is time."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin der Herold des Endes, das Ihr so fürchtet. Der Todlose hat Euren Namen nicht geflüstert, lasst Eure Furcht also gehen. Niemand wird Euch das Leben nehmen, ehe Eure Zeit gekommen ist."

languages.text: «Soy la heraldo del fin que tanto temes. El Inmortal no ha susurrado tu nombre, así que despójate de tu miedo. Nadie se cobrará tu vida antes de que llegue la hora».
languages.original_text: "I am the herald of the end you fear so much. The Undying One has not whispered your name, so cast away your fear. No one will take your life before it is time."

traits.locale_text: «Soy la heraldo del fin que tanto temes. El Inmortal no ha susurrado tu nombre, así que despójate de tu miedo. Nadie se cobrará tu vida antes de que llegue la hora».

languages.text: 「私はお前が恐れる終末の先触れ。不死の者がお前の名を囁くことはなのだから、恐怖は捨てよ。時が来るまでお前の命を奪うものは誰もいない」
languages.original_text: "I am the herald of the end you fear so much. The Undying One has not whispered your name, so cast away your fear. No one will take your life before it is time."

traits.locale_text: 「私はお前が恐れる終末の先触れ。不死の者がお前の名を囁くことはなのだから、恐怖は捨てよ。時が来るまでお前の命を奪うものは誰もいない」

languages.text: “我就是你如此惧怕的死亡使者。不死之神并没有低声说出你的名字，所以放下你的恐惧吧。在你的大限到来之前，没人会夺走你的性命。”
languages.original_text: "I am the herald of the end you fear so much. The Undying One has not whispered your name, so cast away your fear. No one will take your life before it is time."

traits.locale_text: “我就是你如此惧怕的死亡使者。不死之神并没有低声说出你的名字，所以放下你的恐惧吧。在你的大限到来之前，没人会夺走你的性命。”

languages.text: « Je suis le héraut de cette fin qui vous terrifie. Mais n'ayez crainte, l'Immortel n'a pas encore murmuré votre nom. Nul ne prendra votre vie avant l'heure. »
languages.original_text: "I am the herald of the end you fear so much. The Undying One has not whispered your name, so cast away your fear. No one will take your life before it is time."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis le héraut de cette fin qui vous terrifie. Mais n'ayez crainte, l'Immortel n'a pas encore murmuré votre nom. Nul ne prendra votre vie avant l'heure. »

languages.text: "Ben, yüreğini böylesine korkuyla dolduran ölümün habercisiyim. Ölmeyen, senin adını fısıldamadı. Bundandır ki korkuyu bir kenara bırak. Zamanı gelmeden evvel kimse canını almayacak."
languages.original_text: "I am the herald of the end you fear so much. The Undying One has not whispered your name, so cast away your fear. No one will take your life before it is time."
